testimonials_subtitle: The trust of the Latino community in Chicago
testimonial_1_text: "The Fresh Hub changed my business. My customers always compliment me on the freshness of my vegetables. Since working with them, my supermarket is the benchmark of the neighborhood."
testimonial_2_text: "Finally, a supplier who understands what I need for my taqueria. The peppers have the perfect heat, the cilantro smells as it should. My tacos have never had so much flavor."
testimonial_3_text: "I've been in Chicago for 15 years and have never found such a reliable supplier. They speak my language, understand my business, and never fail me. They are my family."
testimonial_3_location: Restaurante Mi Pueblo, Back of the Yards
